title: Oil Holds Two-Month Low as Surplus Offsets Geopolitical Tensions
description: Oil was steady near the lowest level in almost two months as fears of a glut outweighed heightened geopolitical tensions.
content: Oil was steady near the lowest level in almost two months as fears of a glut outweighed heightened geopolitical tensions.
